    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.io.File file)
              throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads the configuration from the specified File.
        Parameters:
        file - the file the config is stored in
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the configuration file can't be read.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file can't be found

      • writeFromMember

        public void writeFromMember()
                     throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Writes the values of the members to the config and saves it to the disk.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if we can't write to the config

      • readWholeXML

        public java.lang.String readWholeXML()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of the config file and returns it as String.
        Returns:
        the content of the config.xml file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file can't be read.

      • writeWholeXML

        public void writeWholeXML(java.lang.String textToWrite)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the content of the String into the config.xml. ATTENTION! the system needs to be rebooted after running this method!
        Parameters:
        textToWrite - the content for the config.xml file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the old configuration can not be deleted
